mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 27; "Fingerprint Expert: Death of Pioneer of Identification System"; Obituary stating Dr. Faulds was known for pioneering fingerprint identification. Also mentions his publications and his testimony as fingerprint expert in a trial of 1905.; Daily Herald; DF 654

Faulds, Henry, 18431930
